name: Toadfolk
startIntroPart1: We are the Toadfolk, protectors of the Marshrealm
declaringWar: Your deeds shall not go unpunished, dishonourable wretch! prepare for war!
attacked: Your armies will grind themselves to dust against our walls.
defeated: The citadels have fallen, but the knights will remain.
introduction: The Knights of the Swamp bid you welcome, stranger!
hateNo: Do you take us for fools?
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer, so that our works may grace your realm.
uniques: Provides a [Castle] in your first [3] cities for free
